product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents.
Capacity of 2100 ltr.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: vertical, manufacturing standard: ASME(american society of mechanical engineers) section-VIII part-I, bladder material: BUNA-N, accessories: all necessary valves, accessories: hydraulically operated foam concentrate control valve, accessories: fittings & instruments, reference: technical data sheet attached with tender documents

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: AR-AFFF(3%), feature: PFOS/PFAS free, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20⁰C, PH: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications
150 NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C (heavy class), material: GI(galvanized iron), standard: IS 1239(indian standard 1239), fittings: threaded or grooved, accessories: elbows, accessories: tees, accessories: reducers, accessories: welding flanges, accessories: clamps, accessories: MS(mild steel) brackets/hangers, accessories: steel supports, coating: zinc chromate primer, coating: 2 coats red enamel paint, reference: as per fire authorities requirement, location: above ground pipes, reference: as per specifications

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved red oxide primer and two coats of approved red enamel paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved coupling. All escavation, pedestal supports, structural supports shall be of vendor's scope.
150 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: MS(mild steel) black steel, grade: heavy, standard: IS 1239(indian standard 1239) part-1, fittings: elbows, fittings: tees, fittings: flanges, fittings: reducers, fittings: clamps, fittings: MS(mild steel) support dash fasteners, coating: two coats approved red oxide primer, coating: two coats approved red enamel paint, joint type: grooved coupling, scope: all excavation, pedestal supports, structural supports by vendor

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of  Air Buffer tank complete with necessary components. The compressor shall be of capacity 15 M³/Hr( FAD), discharge pressure 10 bar, single stage, reciprocating type.
